metadata.name: DNS TXT Answer with Possible Execution Strings
metadata.comment: Detects strings used in command execution in DNS TXT Answer

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND lower(query.type) = lower('txt') AND (contains(lower(answers.rdata), lower('iex')) OR contains(lower(answers.rdata), lower('invoke-expression')) OR contains(lower(answers.rdata), lower('cmd.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects strings used in command execution in DNS TXT Answer
